Text: Pioneer OilHi Mark Ive been talking to the folks at Pioneer Oil Company regarding their coalbed methane project in Sheridan County WY and have quoted them a gathering rate for redelivery into Big Horn They currently have only wells drilled with plans to drill a total of sites coals each by years end Based on the results of this pilot project an additional wells will be drilled in the first quarter of This pilot project is located in TN RW and is a stones throw from BHGG They are interested in discussing transportation and marketing options Wayne Fisher has been my primary contact to date and is a consultant working with Pioneer in Sheridan Tad Butt is President of Pioneer and is located in Billings MT This is their first coalbed methane play Pioneer Oil Company is a supplier of equipment and services to the asphalt paving industry Wayne Fisher Crown Drive Sheridan WY fax cell Tad D Butt President Pioneer Oil Main Street Suite A Billings MT fax Please give me a call after you have talked with Wayne andor Tad Thanks for your help Linda K McNamee Director Business Development Bear Paw Energy direct fax
